content: fried egg skill level beginner materials ● #6 super bulky yarn in 2 colours yellow and white ● 4 5mm hook ● 12mm safety eyes ● embroidery thread ● yarn needle ● fiberfill stuffing abbreviations ● single_crochet - single_crochet ● increase - increase ● decrease - decrease by zaras hookz fried egg ● magic_ring - magic_ring ● blo - back loop only ● trdec - triple decrease crochet 3 stitches together ● st - stitch ● st count is shown in brackets at end of round ex 6 ● repetitions shown in brackets with multiplier ex 2 single_crochet increase x6 ● fo - fasten_off notes ● this pattern is crocheted in rounds ● a stitch marker should be used at the beginning of each round ● when starting the egg white make sure to have the top of the yolk towards you pattern yolk 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 increase around 12 3 1 single_crochet increase x6 18 4-5 single_crochet around 18 insert safety eyes between row 3 and 4 leave 3 stitches between them 6 blo - decrease around 9 7 decrease x3 trdec 4 slip_stitch fo and sew yolk shut by zaras hookz fried egg egg white create a slip_stitch on your hook in the front loops of round 6 1 1 single_crochet increase x9 27 2 2 single_crochet increase x9 36 3 3 single_crochet increase x9 45 4 4 single_crochet increase x9 54 5 5 single_crochet increase x9 63 slip_stitch and fo weave in ends finishing take your needle and embroidery thread embroider your eggs smile over row 5 of the yolk below the 3 stitch wide gap we left between the eyes congratulations you now have a fully assembled egg by zaras hookz
